basics.name: Daniele Di Mauro
basics.label: Computer Vision and Machine learning Specialist
basics.summary: An Italian-born Computer Vision and Machine learning Specialist

work.name: NCE s.r.l.
work.summary: Design and development of a Client/Server audio/video streaming systems. Eclipse RCP UI Design and development. Database analyst

work.name: Offerte tour operator
work.summary: Design and development of a WebService aggregator in JAVA (JBoss). Design and development of SOAP and RESTful API to retrieve aggregated data. Design and development of WebApp to consume data from the API (AngularJS based). Exposure to MySql and Oracle DBs

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
